Comment: Tachykinin expression was observed by in situ hybridization and immunostaining (Winther et al.
Adult protocerebral LPP1 tachykinin neur.SuperCategory: Adult tachykinin neuron of the central nervous system
Adult protocerebral LPP1 tachykinin neur.Definition: Adult neuron that expresses tachykinin (FBgn0037976) and  whose cell body is located in the posterior protocerebrum. One cluster of around 12 cell bodies is found per hemisphere (Winther et al., 2003).
